basics.name: Yurii Kovalenko
basics.label: Senior Frontend Developer/Fullstack
basics.summary: With a solid foundation in web development and a blend of frontend expertise coupled with backend experience, I possess robust technical skills. My adeptness in communication complements my ability to lead teams and develop projects from their inception. I am a dedicated lifelong learner, consistently keeping an eye on evolving technology trends, ensuring a proactive approach to staying updated in the field. I am a passionate developer who is always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

skills: Vue.js, React, React Hooks, JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, TailwindCSS, Basics of Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, Basic PHP, Cypress, GraphQL, REST API, Vuex, Redux
